headline: Show HN: AI Writer for Content Marketing
description:
Content marketing is so hard so I built this AI writing tool to help people write faster. You can use it to write articles to do SEO. You can use it to generate 1000 words for free after you sign up. Please try it and tell me what can be improved!

https://writableai.com

I am not sure what features to build next. That’s why your opinions matter!
